title: House For Sale @ Rajagiriya
details:
HOME IS NOT A PLACE… IT’S A FEELING…
This modern design details are
Bedroom - 2
Bathroom - 1
Floor Area - 1400
No of Floors - 2
We offer many pre-designed beautiful houses according to your requirements & we believe in delivery on the given time frame…
Homely Hood Styles is leading construction company which successfully deliver projects across Sri Lanka. Homely Hood Styles was established in 2012 & We are proud to maintain consistent business and quality of service in the market place. Our projects are delivered on time with a less budget according to the customers’ requirements. Our organization provides the ”delivery guaranty” which is essential for our clients, this is achieved through a unique a combination with our highly skilled people & well experienced builders.
WE HAVE WELL DEFINED PROCESS METHODS...
Duration to complete single storied house - 3 Months
Two storied houses 6-8 months
Payment Scheme: No Down payments
We take stage by stage payments as per the structure
Legal framework
WE DELIVER WHAT OTHERS PROMISE & WE MAKE THE CUSTOMER THE HERO OF OUR STORY…
